body:
## Expected Behavior
SDK when polling a task queue, must provide task queue kind, or sticky task queue can be treated as normal task queue. if task queue kind if not set, server should emit an warn / error message:

ref: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/f4d0290f27f2e900b5bd318e5952222dd61642bd/client/matching/loadbalancer.go#L118

moreover, server should do exhaust enum value check, e.g. 
```go
switch enum {
case enum1:
case enum2:
default:
    // panic / error / logging
}
title: Log warn if task queue kind not set
